scripts.test:game: npx playwright test --project=mobiGameTest --headed &; allure generate allure-results -o allure-report --clean && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:desktop: npx playwright test --project=promotions.desktop.1440 --project=promotions.mobile.1024.chrome &; npx allure generate allure-results -o allure-report --clean && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:promotions: npx playwright test --project=promotions.desktop.1440 --project=promotions.mobile.1024.chrome --project=promotions.mobile.375.chrome &; npx allure generate allure-results -o allure-report --clean && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:desktop:headed: npx playwright test --project=promotions.desktop.1440 --project=promotions.mobile.1024.chrome --headed &; allure generate allure-results -o allure-report --clean && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:all: npx playwright test &; allure generate allure-results -o allure-report --clean && allure open allure-report
scripts.wip: npx playwright test --project=mobile.375.chrome &; allure generate allure-results -o allure-report --clean && allure open allure-report
scripts.report: allure generate allure-results -o allure-report --clean && allure open allure-report
